version_description: - Bug fixes and performance improvements.

- New Home Screen: Say hello to our new lightweight design and and simplified navigation. When you open the app, you’ll be greeted by a friendly Home screen that--TA-DA!!--puts more of the info you need front and center. The new Home screen widgets make i
- Fixed an issue with TouchID
- Bug fixes
Fixed an issue where closing the app would cause it to relaunch.

- Tip Suggestions: Transaction notifications for restaurants and other services now include a handy tip calculation. Because who wants to do math?
- Split Bill: Need to divvy up the cable bill with roommates or a group dinner with friends? We help you
Bug fixes and enhancements.
Bug fixes and enhancements.

Experts recommend having three to six months of expenses in an emergency fund. The best way to do it? Pay yourself first. That means setting aside the money as soon as you receive it. Now Chime gives you the option to automatically transfer 10% of your di
Bug fixes and performance enhancements.
Bug fixes and performance enhancements.
Bug fixes and enhancements.

- Revamped Apple Watch app, you can now view your linked accounts at a glance!
- All new Today widget to quickly see your balances.
- Fix for Rewards not loading.
- Fix for invite friends sometimes breaking.
Legibility, stability, and performance improvements.
Fix major crash issues.
Stability improvements for Rewards, ATM Finder, and Transfers.
Fixed Today Widget & other major improvements.
Stability improvements.
Stability improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

- Fix iOS 11 bugs
- Fix Today Widget
- Fix Apple Watch
- Performance Enhancements

Much like how Chime helps you clean up your finances and make your money work for you, in this update we also cleaned up our own code and made the app work more efficiently. Did that screen load faster or was it your imagination? (Shh, we're not telling..

Now you can be the first to tell your friends that the Chime app just updated with code cleanup and performance improvements!!! What? They don't care about that? Well, you're still cool in our eyes, amigo.

• Updated colors to make the Chime app even more delightful
• Improved navigation in the Settings menu
• Lots of other small bug fixes

* Enhancements to how you navigate and search
* Plus lots of other small bug fixes

- Support for iOS 11.1
- Fixes for the Balance Widget
- General bug fixes and improvements

~~ TL;DR ~~
• A whole new look - we’ve redesigned the app to make it easier to find important information and features!
• A whole new technical implementation - you won’t notice a big difference today, but we’ll be able to ship new features way fast

• Enhancements to how you sort and organize your transactions
• Plus lots of other small bug fixes

• Account Statements can now be downloaded and shared
• Improved scrolling for Pay Friends contact list
• Clearer error messages when internet connection is unstable
• Plus lots of other small bug fixes

• Improved formatting for transaction amounts, phone numbers, and ATM disclosures
• Clearer messages when transferring between savings and spending accounts
• Plus lots of other small bug fixes

• Invite your friends to Chime more easily than ever
• Navigate the app more intuitively through improved icons and buttons
• Plus lots of other small bug fixes

• Deposit checks without needing to write "For deposit at Chime only" on them
• Improved instructions for transferring money between your Chime accounts
• Plus lots of other bug fixes

• Find out more about the benefits of Chime in the carousel when you're logged out
• Plus lots of other small bug fixes
• Lots of small bug fixes

• Improved designs for logged-out informational carousel
• Clearer instructions for mobile check deposit
• Plus lots of other small bug fixes

• Various performance enhancements across the app
• Lots of other small bug fixes

• Redesigned menus making navigation easier and faster
• Improved organization of the Settings tab
• Lots of other small bug fixes

• Faster load times when enrolling
• Improvements to ChimeBot
• Lots of other small bug fixes

• New and improved app icons
• More informative confirmation screens on ACH transfers
• Lots of other small bug fixes

• Updated colors to make the Chime app even more delightful
• Improved navigation in the Settings menu
• Lots of other small bug fixes

If the Chime app crashes in the middle of the forest, is anyone around to hear it? We are. Our engineers fixed a crash that sometimes happens on logout, and squashed a few other bugs while we were there.

Ding ding, all aboard the new Chime app release ship! Not you, bugs, you stay there.
• When linking external bank accounts, you used to just see a blank white screen while it made the connection. We hate leaving you in the dark (or white, as it were) s

Now you can be the first to tell your friends that the Chime app just updated with code cleanup and performance improvements!!! What? They don't care about that? Well, you're still cool in our eyes, amigo.

Much like how Chime helps you clean up your finances and make your money work for you, in this update we also cleaned up our own code and made the app work more efficiently. Did that screen load faster or was it your imagination? (Shh, we're not telling..

We're thankful for you, loyal Chime members. Our growing team of engineers have been hard at work improving the app's look, feel, and features.
* We gave ChimeBot a little upgrade 'n polish to ensure it keeps up its quality of service.
* We adjusted

What's this? Things look a little different! In this update, we've refreshed our app's colors and fonts to improve accessibility (and bring joy to our designers). Don't worry, all your favorite functionalities are still in the same places! (But not the bu

What's this? Things look a little different! We've refreshed our app's colors and fonts to improve accessibility (and bring joy to our designers). Don't worry, all your favorite functionalities are still in the same places! (But not the bugs. Shoo, bugs.)

Ding dong, let's Chime in the New Year with a new app update!
* We fixed up the Settings screen so that it loads even if it gets a connection error. You gotta load!! Those settings are important!
* For the screens where you update your personal inf

Happy February, Chime fam, we're sending some love your way! ...in the form of bug fixes and lines of code. Everyone loves that, right?
* There was a bug that tried to crash the app if it didn't like some of your friends in your contacts list. We kicke

Happy February, Chime fam, we're sending some love your way! ...in the form of bug fixes and lines of code. Everyone loves that, right?
* There was a bug that tried to crash the app if it didn't like some of your friends in your contacts list. We kicke

In this update, we [nerd voice] upgraded our app's navigation library. [normal voice] What does that mean for you? A buttery-smooth ride as you swipe and tap your way through the app, and fewer crashes or bugs in your teeth... we hope!

Hey, we hear you're spending a bit more time at home these days. We wish we could send you a care package, but all we've got is this Chime app update :) Our team is still working nonstop from our bedrooms/bunkers/secret labs to bring you the smoothest, bu

* Linking a bank account to Chime is now WAY FASTER! If you had issues before with the connection timing out, please try again!
* In a kind-of-meta move, we improved the appearance of the dialog where we prompt you to review this app. Hopefully its shi

What’s up? We fixed some stuff. You probably definitely won’t notice anything, but now you know. Oh... and stay beautiful.
* When opening the ATM map for the first time, it used to flicker uncomfortably. Now you will experience a smooooth glide to your

What’s up? We fixed some stuff. You probably definitely won’t notice anything, but now you know. Oh... and stay beautiful.
* When opening the ATM map for the first time, it used to flicker uncomfortably. Now you will experience a smooooth glide to your

We know that access to your government stimulus money is at the top of many of our members' minds. We've expanded our app's mobile check deposit options to give checks from the U.S. Treasury the extra attention and care they need.
A bug sneaked into the last app version, causing some of you to get logged out a lot more than usual. This quick update fixes that - sorry for the inconvenience!

In accordance with the new federal regulations, we've removed the limit for number of transfers from your savings to your spending account. We'll notify you if this changes, but for now there's no chance of your funds getting stuck in your savings when yo

Good:
∙ Crashing on the couch after a hard day's work
∙ Crashing a cool party

Bad:
∙ Crashing your rental scooter
∙ Crashing the Chime app

Has your employment been affected? Our new Unemployment Assistant is here to help answer your questions such as whether you qualify for unemployment benefits, how to apply, and more. Take a deep breath - you've got this.

Psst. Hey. Yeah you. Click here* if you're looking for a good Chime.

*By "here" we mean the "Update" button, where we bring you new features such as:
∙ The "ATM Map" tab has been renamed to "Get Cash", because it lists cash back locations too!

Psst. Hey. Yeah you. Click here* if you're looking for a good Chime.

*By "here" we mean the "Update" button, where we bring you new features such as:
∙ The "ATM Map" tab has been renamed to "Get Cash", because it lists cash back locations too!
Introducing Credit Builder, a no fee, 0% APR secured credit card that helps you build your credit with everyday purchases! Go to Settings to sign up for the waitlist now!
Introducing Credit Builder, a no fee, 0% APR secured credit card that helps you build your credit with everyday purchases! Go to Settings to sign up for the waitlist now!

We're thrilled to announce the Chime Savings Account now offers 1.00% Annual Percentage Yield* for your rainy day fund. All the more reason to turn on your Automatic Savings and let the little cash gremlins do the work for you!

∙ Look out - we made the row sizes a bit narrower in your friends lists! Don't mis-tap and send money to your dentist instead of your aunt!
∙ Users who are enrolled in Credit Builder can always find the option to activate their new or reissued Credit B

∙ We fixed a bug where sometimes if you got logged out, you would get stuck on the "See ya later!" screen. Please rest assured that we do not intend to wave goodbye to you forever!! Our arms are open and welcoming!

∙ More accurate, up-to-date locations!
∙ See a list of locations near you, with detailed info such as hours and cash limits!
∙ 10x faster load and better reliability of data!

Dear screen reader users: We are still thinking of you! In this release we've improved our buttons a bit more so that VoiceOver will tell you whether a button is disabled or busy. More improvements to come!

When the check hits your bank and puts gas in your tank, that's a Chime

You thought we were going to say "minor performance improvements and bug fixes", but NOPE! We've got... um... bug fixes. And... improvements. To performance. It's worth it, we promise!
You thought we were going to say "minor performance improvements and bug fixes", but NOPE! We've got... um... bug fixes. And... improvements. To performance. It's worth it, we promise!

Did you know you can add cash to your Chime debit card at places like Walgreens and CVS? In this release, we've revamped the cash deposit map to bring you a much smoother and shinier in-app experience. Tap on "Deposit cash" in the Move Money tab to see lo

Did you know you can add cash to your Chime debit card at places like Walgreens and CVS? We've revamped the cash deposit map to bring you a much smoother and shinier in-app experience. Tap on "Deposit cash" in the Move Money tab to see locations near you!

We're working on making your home screen faster and more reliable! Think of it as upgrading the plumbing and air ducts inside your walls. You can't see it, but you'll appreciate it when that cold snap hits and you're sitting at home warm and toasty with a

A haiku for you:
In this update we
Squashed bugs and improved the app
Frog sounds, autumn rain.

In this update, we learned to pat our heads and rub our bellies at the same time! What does that mean for you? A faster and smoother home screen loading experience, so you can more easily show off your bank's cool slick mobile app to someone else! Or, you

It's our second to last update of the year before we're off to enjoy the festivities - let's make it a jolly good one!
• We've upgraded the way you link an external bank account, like Chase or Wells Fargo!
• We cut down the loading time on embedded
